title: What Are Core Design Principles?
description: Learn the essential design principles that help create clear and usable interfaces.

words.fact: Balanced layouts feel easier to process. Why it matters: visual stability reduces cognitive strain. Today's takeaway: evenly spaced elements help users scan content comfortably.
Contrast helps important elements stand out. Why it matters: users notice key information faster. Today's takeaway: use contrast to guide attention.
Alignment creates visual order. Why it matters: misalignment feels chaotic and unplanned. Today's takeaway: aligned layouts feel professional and clear.
Simple designs are easier to understand. Why it matters: unnecessary complexity increases errors. Today's takeaway: remove what users don't need.
Items placed close together feel related. Why it matters: proximity improves comprehension. Today's takeaway: spacing is a powerful organizing tool.
